results.title: News and views in myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome (ME/CFS): The role of co-morbidity and novel treatments.
results.text_hl: News and views in @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue_Syndrome_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015673 @@@myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Fatigue_Syndrome_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015673 @@@ME/CFS@@@): The role of co-morbidity and novel treatments.

citations.NLM: Comhaire F, Deslypere JP. News and views in myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome (ME/CFS): The role of co-morbidity and novel treatments. Med Hypotheses. 2020 Jan;134():109444. PMID: 31669858

results.title: Pharmacological activation of AMPK and glucose uptake in cultured human skeletal muscle cells from patients with ME/CFS
results.text_hl: The aim of the present study was to assess if @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ could be activated pharmacologically in @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue_Syndrome_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015673 @@@ME/CFS@@@. Primary skeletal muscle cell cultures from @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue_Syndrome_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015673 @@@ME/CFS@@@ and healthy controls were treated with either @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or compound 991.

citations.NLM: Brown AE, Dibnah B, Fisher E, Newton JL, Walker M. Pharmacological activation of AMPK and glucose uptake in cultured human skeletal muscle cells from patients with ME/CFS Biosci Rep. 2018 Jun 29;38(3):. PMID: 29654166
